content: Kwik Bolt 1 Wedge anchor High-performance wedge anchor for cracked concrete and seismic (carbon steel) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Especially suitable for seismic relevant applications as well as cracked concrete (tension zone) Seismic tested in accordance with ACI 355.2 and ICC-ES AC 193 Per IAPMO, compliant for use with Hilti Adaptive Torque (AT) Module for Mechanical Safeset Product and length identification markings facilitate quality control and inspection Applications Fastening structural steel, facades, electrical and mechanical equipment, hand rails and racks ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Head configuration: Externally threaded Approvals / Test reports: FM (Factory Mutual), IAPMO, LABC, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Head configuration | Externally threaded | Approvals / Test reports | FM (Factory Mutual), IAPMO, LABC, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) | Installation tools | TE 6-22 Cordless rotary hammer, SIW 4AT-22 ½” Cordless impact wrench | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2267772 -
